DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect smoke reduction v usual care ( quit advice ) individual peripheral arterial disease smoke .
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomly assign smoker quit date set either smoke reduction grop usual care group . The smoking reduction group receive behavioral counsel smoke reduction nicotine patch and/or gum reduce number cigarette smoke per day least 50 % . The usual care group give brief advice quit smoke referral local cessation service . To include study , participant must peripheral arterial disease ( define ankle Brachial Index equal less 0.85 history prior revascularization ) must daily smoker ( define least 1 cigarette , cigar , tobacco pipe daily ) . Participants complete questionnaire measure mood , functional ability , smoke history , motivation quit smoking . Participants follow study 24 month .
